explains: n. 不适当；不正确；用词错误；[审计] 不正当行为

sentences.en: He resigned amid allegations of financial impropriety.
sentences.cn: 他因在财务上不恰当的陈述辞职了。

sentences.en: They were shocked by the impropriety of the young man's action.
sentences.cn: 他们为那年轻人的不当举止而感到震惊。

sentences.en: Right now, the French can ill-afford even the whiff of impropriety.
sentences.cn: 目前，法国人承受不了哪怕一点点的行为欠妥。
